Our Projects

Combricks - BCL Mine (2015) Profibus network audit and fault repair. Installation and commissioning of the online Profibus network monitoring tool (Combricks).

ABB Profibus module upgrade, S200 to S7800 - BCL Mine (2015) Upgrade of the profibus couplers and I/O modules (Analog In/out and Digital In/Out).

Adroit SCADA System upgrade - BMC (2016) Upgrade of Adroit version 6 to version 8.

Modbus Interfacing GE and Siemens: Discovery metals (2014) - Identification of MODBUS addresses ASSAY DATA and interface to CITECT SCADA. Equip: S7-400, MODBUS TCP/IP communication.

Siemens HMI Interfacing: Discovery metals 2014 - S71200 programming and SCADA interfacing. Equip: Simatic S7-1200, Simatic HMI.

Telementry system: Water Utilities Corporation 2012 - Matshelagabedi - Matsiloje link to Shashe treatment plant. Equipment used Elpro radios, Micrologix 1400 PLC, Radwin wireless Lan radios and Adroit SCADA.

Control system upgrade: Debswana, Jwaneng 2012, Upgrade of water supply plant control system Siemens S7300.

Human Machine Interface system upgrade of the Chiller Plant's Human Machine Interface. The Simatic MP277 is linked to two S7300 PLC's via Profibus.
